summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 对象是否在 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件末尾自动添加代码来调用 [Sys.Application](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cd901c0f-51e2-4c63-9963-158f4a88b008) 类的客户端 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the object automatically adds code at the end of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) file to call the client method of the [Sys.Application](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cd901c0f-51e2-4c63-9963-158f4a88b008) class.

value.span: 如果在 JavaScript 文件结尾自动调用了 [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) 方法，则为 ；如果用户代码调用 JavaScript 文件中已有的 [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) 方法，则为 。

span.span: if the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method is automatically called at the end of a JavaScript file, or if user code calls the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method that is already in the JavaScript file.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false` 如果你引用程序集中的脚本文件，并且脚本文件已经包含用于调用[sys.application.notifyscriptloaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6)的代码，则将属性设置为。Set the property to `false` if you reference a script file in an assembly and the script file already contains code to call [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6). 如果从脚本文件中调用 [sys.application.notifyscriptloaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) 方法多次，则会引发错误。An error is thrown if [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method is called more than one time from a script file. 如果引用未嵌入到程序集中的独立脚本文件，则必须在脚本文件的末尾添加代码以调用 [sys.application.notifyscriptloaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) 方法。If you reference a standalone script file that is not embedded in an assembly, you must include code at the end of the script file to call the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd95aa94-34bb-45b6-ac06-1cb4031469c6) method. 下面的示例演示要在脚本文件末尾包含的代码。The following example shows the code to include at the end of the script file. ``` if(typeof(Sys) !== "undefined) Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded(); ```

MemberSignature.Value: protected static string ReplaceExtension (string pathOrName);
.method familystatic hidebysig string ReplaceExtension(string pathOrName) cil managed

protected: static System::String ^ ReplaceExtension(System::String ^ pathOrName);
static member ReplaceExtension : string -> string

param.name: pathOrName
param.span: 要重命名的脚本的完整路径。

span.span: The full path of the script to rename.
The path must end with ".js".

summary.span: 替换指定脚本路径中的文件扩展名以指定调试脚本。

span.span: Replaces the file-name extension in the specified script path to designate a debug script.

returns.span: 一个字符串，其中包含带有 debug 扩展名的脚本的路径。

span.span: A string that contains the path of the script with the debug extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法假定脚本具有 ".js" 扩展。This method assumes that the script has a ".js" extension. 然后，它将扩展名替换为 ".debug.js"。It then replaces the extension with ".debug.js".
